SA06n913:2: prathamaṃ prāmāṇika ācāryaḥ śiṣye prasāda-sampratyayābhilāṣātmikāṃ śraddhāṃ janayet |
SA06n913:10: stotā sugataviśiṣṭaguṇasmaraṇadvārā sādaraṃ stutvā tattadvṛddhikarāṇyapi padāni uccaret |
SA06n913:13: adhyeṣaṇādibhirdvividhaṃ bodhicittaṃ samutpādya teṣāṃ svasvabhāvaṃ bhedaṃ vaiśiṣṭyañcāpi khyāpayet |
SA06n913:21: sā ca apramādena samprajanyena smṛtyā ca grahaṇīyeti śikṣeta |
SA06n913:23: tadanuṣṭhānāyāpi tīvravīryamutpādya nidhyānaduḥkhādhivāsanākṣāntim avikṣipta-samādhiṃ prajñāniḥsvabhāvatāṃ ca jñātvā triśikṣāṃ trividhaprajñāṃ vā samādhāya caryāpathavidhinā śikṣeta iti nirdiśet |
SA06n913:27: ayaṃ tu lākṣaṇikamahāyānacittotpāda-śikṣā-deśanā-vidhiḥ kramo vā audārikatayā darśitaḥ |
